root.name: The Operational Art of War III
root.description: Spanning from the early 1900's into this century, this game has the player play as one out of two sides in various military conflicts either against a computer opponent or against another human player in hotseat or play-by-e-mail multiplayer. On top of having a large selection of historical and hypothetical scenarios right out of the box it also comes with an in-game editor that lets the player create maps and scenarios of their own.
